lead_paragraph: GREENFIELD--Lenore. Lenore died peacefully February 16, 2016. Knowing she was terminal, she spent her last six weeks welcoming family and friends with whom she would reminisce, with lots of laughter and joy. Born in the Bronx, to Felix and Eva Hirschberg, she was a fervent New Yorker. An artist and teacher, she was an advocate of creativity, peace and tolerance. Predeceased by her husband, William, she is survived by her truly loving sons and their spouses Stephen and Kit and Paul and Martha, her grandchildren Sarah and Ilan, who were so supportive of her, and great- grandchildren Luna, Balthazar and Keila, as well as cousins and an international circle of friends who were her extended family. A memorial celebration will be held in New York in the future. 1/3
